name: ChampionshipBoxing
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: championship boxing
des:
Championship Boxing relives the golden age of boxing when world championships were undisputed and the champions were household names.
Championship Boxing is an interactive game where you choose the opponents and Alexa picks random results.
Request a rematch and you may possibly get different results including the manner in which the fight ends.
Championship boxing contains real fight sounds to add realism to the game.
